product_name: Patagonia Baby Synchilla Fleece Vest - Toddlers' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: How cute will your little one look in the Patagonia Baby Synchilla Fleece Vest for toddlers? Incredibly. Warm, soft polyester double-faced fleece features mostly recycled content. Tapered, non-chafing, stand-up collar keeps your little one warm; zip front has a wind-blocking flap. Drop-tail hem extends coverage and increases comfort. Hand-me-down ID label ensures his vest won't get lost in the crowd. Closeout.
short_description: How cute will your little one look in the Patagonia Baby Synchilla Fleece Vest for toddlers? Incredibly.
